TestCase.TestCaseTitle: Multiple Overlays (Current Situation, Planning, containing BSOs) coexistence first general check
TestCase.TestCaseObjective: Verify if the current and the planned situation can be visualized via two different Overlays, one of them containing a BSO with its current situation properties, the other containing another BSO with planned properties.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: Two BSOs are created. Then two Overlays named "Current Situation" and "Planning" are created. Each BSO is associated to one of the Overlays. Both Overlays and the BSO are created by Nation A and exchanged via an appropriate P/S Topic or via Request/Response mechanism with Nation B.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: R/R, P/S.
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: Nation A has created a topic, which includes the Overlays and the BSOs contained in it. Nation B has subscribed to this topic.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: Both Overlays can be displayed separately as well as together indicating the current situation and the planned situation on both nations' systems.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A creates BSO_1 and Overlay "Current Situation" and assigns BSO_1 to Overlay "Current Situation".
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Overlay and BSO are transferred to Nation B and displayed correctly on both nations' systems.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A creates BSO_2 and Overlay "Planning" and assigns BSO_1 to Overlay "Current Situation".
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Overlay and BSO are transferred to Nation B and displayed correctly on both nations' systems. Both overlays can be displayed separately as well as together.
